name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 121
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, While I Put Myself Back Together. I’ve been falling apart lately with my kids school quarantined, the stress of a new job on the way while still working my current one, and Omicron lingering over everything I do; I ask you to Please Stand By while I put myself back together. I’ll be back to my regular self in no time!
